General.Name: Teton Advisors Inc
General.Description: Teton Advisors, LLC is a publicly owned investment manager. It primarily provides its services to investment companies. The firm is a large advisory firm which provides portfolio management for investment companies, portfolio management for businesses or institutional clients. The firm launches and manages equity, fixed income and balanced portfolio. The firm employs fundamental analysis to create its portfolios. The firm obtains external research to make investments. The firm was formerly known as Gabelli Advisers, Inc. Teton Advisors, LLC was founded in 1994 and is based in Greenwich, Connecticut.
General.Address: 189 Mason Street, Greenwich, CT, United States, 06830
